jrigby.openstack_queue.server.ResourceRequest

    jrigby.openstack_queue.request_templates  
    jrigby.openstack_queue.server  

    • Uses of ResourceRequest in jrigby.openstack_queue.request_templates

      class  ThreeStageJobResourceRequest
      A ResourceRequest that includes the ThreeStageJobCallbackImpl callback.

    • Uses of ResourceRequest in jrigby.openstack_queue.server

      Methods in jrigby.openstack_queue.server with parameters of type ResourceRequest 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean ResourceQueue.acceptableRequest(ResourceRequest request)
      Checks if a job will fit in the project allocation and, if necessary, adjusts the job size to fit.
      private void ResourceQueue.allocate(ResourceRequest request)
      Creates the required instances for the job to execute, and if successful, runs the ResourceProvisioningCallback.onSuccess(ServerCollection) method of the ResourceRequest callback via doSuccess(ServerCollection).
      private void ResourceQueue.clearJobStatus(ResourceRequest req)
      Clears the job from all status lists
      private JobStatus ResourceQueue.requestToJobStatus(ResourceRequest request, ResourceQueue.QueueStatus status, Long startTime)
      Converts a ResourceRequest object to a JobStatus object
      private void ResourceQueue.setQueueStatusCompleted(ResourceRequest req)
      Sets the status of a request to COMPLETED The current implementation just clears the job from all lists and is equivalent to ResourceQueue.clearJobStatus(ResourceRequest).
      private void ResourceQueue.setQueueStatusProvisioning(ResourceRequest req)
      Sets the status of a request to PROVISIONING
      private void ResourceQueue.setQueueStatusRunning(ResourceRequest req, ServerCollection nodes)
      Sets the status of a request to RUNNING
      private void ResourceQueue.setQueueStatusScheduling(ResourceRequest req)
      Sets the status of a request to SCHEDULING
